title: Episode 15: Have You Been Feeling Sadness Or Heavy Lately?
description:
Grief is part of life. We lose people. Relationships end. Life changes. In this episode, Dr. Nicole and Jenna share how grief can be medicine that helps us grow.

Join the SelfHealers Circle Waitlist:

https://howtomeetyourself.com/

https://www.amazon.com/How-Do-Work-Recognize-Patterns/dp/006301209X

Text Nicole! 215-366-0012

Get my FREE Future Self Journal:
